name: VSYNC: OFF
description:
Use screen tearing to go through walls to solve puzzles!
Turns out the testing facility crates are breaking reality, abuse it to break free from the testing facility!

If you play the web version, please maximize, or the game doesn't work properly!
Otherwise, play the windows download version, it has better performance too.

Made for Wowie Jam 2.0

Controls:
WASD to move
Spacebar to jump
Hold R to reset level
